root.name: The Ren & Stimpy Show: Stimpy's Invention
root.description: Overview Ren and Stimpy involves the crazy duo's quest to reclaim all the pieces of Stimpy's invention. The game is a 2D side-scroller that allows two people cooperative gameplay. The game is your run of the mill side-scroller with everyone's favorite two animated idiots at the helm. The game offers the basic shambling enemies and environmental hazards.The game also offers a few special moves such as Stimpy's ability to hurl Ren which can be useful when attempting traverse pitfalls and the lot. Ren is able to pull off Stimpy's nose and use it as a projectile. Much like the Beavis and Butthead titles, the game is worth a try if you're a true fan of the franchise and want some care-free gameplay and awesomely "so bad it's good" laughter.

similar_games.game: Beavis and Butt-head in Virtual Stupidity
